content.body: fwiw its sort of "planned" to have fetch in node, there's just a lot of stuff to do and not a lot of people willing to do it. (jasnell's work on streams, for example)
Can somebody please step in on https://github.com/mdn/content/issues/11743 with a comment to confirm what the argument order is for the replacer function for `String.prototype.replace()`?
content.formatted_body: Can somebody please step in on https://github.com/mdn/content/issues/11743 with a comment to confirm what the argument order is for the replacer function for String.prototype.replace()?

content.body: Is it `(match, offset, string)` or is it instead `(match, string, offset)`?
